name: Shout Temple
description:
WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look around

1 to 5 - Select wich letter to speak

Left Click - Speak

Submission for 2023 annual university of manchester gamejam - Lost in Language

Unbrave this mysterious dungeon with only a roughly translated piece of artifact and try to get the treasure at the end.

This jam was one the most fun I had while building a game, the theme was awesome to build around, just wish I had more time to invest on this game. Thinking about developing it more to achieve the real status that it deserved

Hope you apreciated playing as much I apreciate building it.
